info.title: Ovatify
info.description: Ovatify is a music platform designed to offer a unique and personalized experience to music lovers. This project includes a web application, a mobile application, and a robust backend service to manage streaming, user interactions, and data handling.

tags.name: Friend
tags.description: Operations related to users and their friends

tags.name: Import/Export File
tags.description: Operations related to exporting and importing files

tags.name: Tests
tags.description: Test endpoints that will not be used in front, but good for testing purposes.

get.summary: Search database for songs
get.description: Performs a search in the database based on the provided search string, filtering songs by name, albums, and artists.

parameters.name: search_string
parameters.description: Search string to filter the songs

200.description: Songs found

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

get.summary: Retrieve a song by its ID
get.description: Fetches detailed information about a song using its unique ID.

parameters.name: song_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the song

200.description: Song found

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

404.description: Song not found or User not found

post.summary: Add a new song to the database
post.description: Creates a new song record in the database using provided Spotify ID and additional data. It also handles the rating for the song.

200.description: Rating & song added successfully or Rating added successfully

400.description: Invalid method or Missing parameter or Spotify ID is required or You have already added this song, please update your rating via your library

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

500.description: A KeyError occurred or An unexpected error occurred

get.summary: Search for songs on Spotify
get.description: Performs a search on Spotify using a provided search string and retrieves a list of matching tracks.

parameters.name: search_string
parameters.description: The search string to query Spotify tracks

200.description: Search successful

400.description: Missing search string or Invalid method

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

500.description: KeyError occurred or An unexpected error occurred

get.summary: Get the average rating of a song
get.description: Fetches the average rating for a specific song based on its ID.

parameters.name: song_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the song

200.description: Average rating retrieved successfully

404.description: Song not found or No ratings available for this song

500.description: KeyError occurred or An unexpected error occurred

get.summary: Retrieve a list of genres
get.description: Fetches a list of genres, with the option to specify the number of genres to return.

parameters.name: number_of_genres
parameters.description: The number of genres to return. Use -1 to return all genres.

200.description: List of genres retrieved successfully

400.description: Missing number of genres or Invalid number of genres

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

get.summary: Retrieve songs by genre
get.description: Fetches songs filtered by a specific genre, with an option to limit the number of songs returned.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to return. Use -1 to return all songs.

parameters.name: genre_name
parameters.description: The name of the genre to filter songs by

200.description: List of songs retrieved successfully

400.description: Missing or invalid number of songs or Missing genre name

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

get.summary: Retrieve genres of a specific song
get.description: Fetches genres associated with a specific song, identified by its song ID.

parameters.name: song_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the song

200.description: Genres of the song retrieved successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

get.summary: Retrieve a random list of genres
get.description: Fetches a random list of genres, with an option to specify the number of genres to return.

parameters.name: number_of_genres
parameters.description: The number of random genres to return. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

200.description: Random genres retrieved successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

get.summary: Search for artists
get.description: Retrieve a list of artists based on the provided search text.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: The text to search for artists. If not provided, returns a list of all artists.

200.description: Artists found successfully

get.summary: Search for genres
get.description: Retrieve a list of genres based on the provided search text.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: The text to search for genres. If not provided, returns a list of all genres.

200.description: Genres found successfully

get.summary: Get all moods
get.description: Retrieve a list of all available moods.

200.description: All moods retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get all tempos
get.description: Retrieve a list of all available tempos.

200.description: All tempos retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get a random Banger song
get.description: Retrieve a random Banger song based on specified filters.

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: Filter by artist name.

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: Filter by genre name.

parameters.name: mood
parameters.description: Filter by mood.

parameters.name: tempo
parameters.description: Filter by tempo.

200.description: Song details retrieved successfully

404.description: No Banger songs found with the given filters

post.description: Creates a new user account using the provided email address.

400.description: Missing email or user already exists

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

put.description: Logs in a user and updates their last login time. The user is identified by the provided user ID.

200.description: User logged in successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

get.summary: Retrieve songs rated by the user
get.description: Fetches a list of songs that the user has rated, identified by the user's ID.

200.description: List of user-rated songs retrieved successfully

post.summary: Add a rating to a song
post.description: Allows a user to rate a song by specifying the song ID and the rating value.

song_id.description: The unique identifier of the song to be rated

rating.description: The rating value for the song

400.description: Missing parameter or User rating already exists or Invalid data format

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

404.description: User not found or Song not found or Integrity Error: Invalid user or song reference

500.description: KeyError occurred or An unexpected error occurred

put.summary: Edit a user's rating for a song
put.description: Allows a user to update their rating for a specific song.

song_id.description: The unique identifier of the song whose rating is to be updated

rating.description: The new rating value for the song

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

404.description: User not found or Song not found or User rating not found

500.description: KeyError occurred or An unexpected error occurred

delete.summary: Delete a user's rating for a song
delete.description: Allows a user to delete their rating for a specific song.

parameters.name: song_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the song whose rating is to be deleted

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication token is missing or invalid

500.description: KeyError occurred or An unexpected error occurred

get.summary: Get songs by a specific genre for a user.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to retrieve (default: 10).

parameters.name: genre_name
parameters.description: The name of the genre to filter songs by.

200.description: Successful response with a list of matching songs.

400.description: Invalid number of songs or missing genre name.

get.summary: Get songs by a specific artist for a user.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to retrieve (default: 10).

parameters.name: artist_name
parameters.description: The name of the artist to filter songs by.

200.description: Successful response with a list of matching songs.

400.description: Invalid number of songs or missing artist name.

get.summary: Get songs by a specific tempo for a user.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to retrieve (default: 10).

parameters.name: tempo_name
parameters.description: The name of the tempo to filter songs by, based on the Tempo enum.

200.description: Successful response with a list of matching songs.

400.description: Invalid number of songs or missing tempo name.

get.summary: Get songs by a specific mood for a user.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to retrieve (default: 10).

parameters.name: mood_name
parameters.description: The name of the mood to filter songs by, based on the Mood enum.

200.description: Successful response with a list of matching songs.

400.description: Invalid number of songs or missing mood name.

get.summary: Get a list of songs recently added by a user.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of recently added songs to retrieve. If not specified, all recently added songs will be returned.

200.description: Successful response with a list of recently added songs.

get.summary: Get a list of favorite songs for a user.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of favorite songs to retrieve. If not specified, all favorite songs will be returned.

200.description: Successful response with a list of favorite songs.

get.summary: Get a list of favorite genres for a user based on their song ratings.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining favorite genres. If not specified, all rated songs will be considered.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of top genres to return. If not specified, 10 genres will be returned. You can configure this value to get a better visualization in the chart. For example, if you get too much genres for a given number of songs, and it looks ugly in the chart, you can limit the number of genres to be returned.

200.description: Successful response with a list of favorite genres.

get.summary: Get a list of favorite artists for a user based on their song ratings.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining favorite artists. If not specified, all rated songs will be considered.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of top artists to return. If not specified, 10 artists will be returned. You can configure this value to get a better visualization in the chart. For example, if you get too much artists for a given number of songs, and it looks ugly in the chart, you can limit the number of artists to be returned.

200.description: Successful response with a list of favorite artists.

get.summary: Get a list of favorite moods for a user based on their song ratings.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining favorite moods. If not specified, all rated songs will be considered.

200.description: Successful response with a list of favorite moods.

get.summary: Get a list of favorite tempos for a user based on their song ratings.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining favorite tempos. If not specified, all rated songs will be considered.

200.description: Successful response with a list of favorite tempos.

get.summary: Get a list of the most recently added songs.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of recent songs to retrieve (default: 10).

200.description: Successful response with a list of recent songs.

post.summary: Send a friend request to another user.

requestBody.description: Data needed to send a friend request.

username.description: The username of the receiver of the friend request.

200.description: Friend request sent successfully.

400.description: Missing parameter, user is already a friend, cannot send a request to oneself, or there is already a pending request.

409.description: Conflict with an existing pending friend request.

get.summary: Retrieve all incoming friend requests for the user.

200.description: Successful retrieval of incoming friend requests.

500.description: Internal server error or database error.

get.summary: Get the count of incoming friend requests for the user.

200.description: Successful retrieval of the count of incoming friend requests.

count.description: The number of incoming friend requests.

500.description: Internal server error or database error.

post.summary: Cancel an outgoing friend request to another user.

requestBody.description: Data needed to cancel a friend request.

username.description: The username of the receiver of the friend request to be canceled.

200.description: Friend request canceled successfully.

404.description: Receiver user not found or no pending request exists.

parameters.name: friend_username
parameters.description: The username of the friend to be removed

200.description: Friend removed successfully

400.description: Invalid request or friendship does not exist

404.description: User or friend does not exist

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: The ID of the friend to be added

200.description: Friend added successfully

400.description: Invalid request or friendship already exists

404.description: User or friend does not exist

get.summary: Retrieve all friends of the user.

200.description: Successful retrieval of all friends.

500.description: Internal server error or database error.

put.summary: Edit the preferences of a user.

img_url.description: New image URL for the user's profile.

400.description: Invalid request data or no fields provided for update.

get.summary: Get music recommendations for the user.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of recommendations to retrieve (between 1 and 100).

200.description: Successful retrieval of recommendations.

404.description: No songs found for the user or no recommendations can be made.

500.description: KeyError occurred or an unexpected error occurred.

get.summary: Retrieve the profile information of a user.

200.description: Successful retrieval of user profile.

get.summary: Get the count of songs added by the user over the last five days.

200.description: Successful retrieval of song addition counts per day.

get.summary: Get statistical data about the user's profile.

200.description: Successful retrieval of profile statistics.

rated_count.description: The total number of songs rated by the user.

friend_count.description: The number of friends the user has.

rating_average.description: The average rating given by the user.

get.summary: Get personalized music recommendations based on user's favorite genres and artists.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of recommendations to retrieve (between 1 and 100).

200.description: Successful retrieval of recommendations.

404.description: No genre or artist found for the user, or no recommendations can be made.

500.description: KeyError occurred or an unexpected error occurred.

get.summary: Get music recommendations based on the preferences of the user's friends.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of recommendations to retrieve (between 1 and 100).

200.description: Successful retrieval of recommendations based on friends' preferences.

404.description: No friends found for the user, no songs found for friends, or no recommendations can be made.

500.description: KeyError occurred, user not found, or an unexpected error occurred.

get.summary: Get song recommendations based on what the user's friends are listening to.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of song recommendations to retrieve. Must be a positive number.

200.description: Successful retrieval of recommendations based on friends' listening habits.

404.description: No friends or songs found for the user.

500.description: KeyError occurred or an unexpected error occurred.

get.summary: Export song data filtered by a specific genre for the user.

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: The genre to filter songs by.

200.description: Successful retrieval and export of songs data filtered by the specified genre.

400.description: Missing filter, invalid input, or file operation error.

404.description: User, genre, or artist does not exist.

500.description: Internal server error or file operation error.

get.summary: Export song data filtered by a specific artist for the user.

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: The artist to filter songs by.

200.description: Successful retrieval and export of songs data filtered by the specified artist.

404.description: User, genre, or artist does not exist.

500.description: Internal server error or file operation error.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of artist names from the user's song library.

200.description: Successful retrieval of artist names from the user's library.

404.description: No artist is found for the user or the user does not exist.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of genre names from the user's song library.

200.description: Successful retrieval of genre names from the user's library.

404.description: No genre is found for the user or the user does not exist.

post.summary: Import song data for the user from a JSON file.

requestBody.description: JSON file containing song data to be imported.

file.description: The JSON file containing song data.

400.description: No file provided or missing required fields in the file.

500.description: Unexpected error occurred during file processing.

get.summary: Retrieve all friends of the user who have consented to data sharing.

200.description: Successful retrieval of all friends with data sharing consent.

500.description: Internal server error or database error.

get.summary: Retrieve the favorite music genres of a specific friend, considering their data sharing consent.

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the friend whose favorite genres are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining the friend's favorite genres. If not specified, all rated songs of the friend will be considered.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of top genres to return. If not specified, 10 genres will be returned. You can configure this value to get a better visualization in the chart. For example, if you get too much genres for a given number of songs, and it looks ugly in the chart, you can limit the number of genres to be returned.

200.description: Successful response with a list of the friend's favorite genres.

400.description: Invalid parameters or user does not share data.

get.summary: Retrieve the favorite artists of a specific friend, considering their data sharing consent.

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the friend whose favorite artists are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining the friend's favorite artists. If not specified, all rated songs of the friend will be considered.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of top artists to return. If not specified, 10 artists will be returned. You can configure this value to get a better visualization in the chart. For example, if you get too much artists for a given number of songs, and it looks ugly in the chart, you can limit the number of artists to be returned.

200.description: Successful response with a list of the friend's favorite artists.

400.description: Invalid parameters or user does not share data.

get.summary: Retrieve the favorite music moods of a specific friend, considering their data sharing consent.

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the friend whose favorite music moods are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining the friend's favorite music moods. If not specified, all rated songs of the friend will be considered.

200.description: Successful response with a list of the friend's favorite music moods.

400.description: Invalid parameters or user does not share data.

get.summary: Retrieve the favorite music tempos of a specific friend, considering their data sharing consent.

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the friend whose favorite music tempos are to be retrieved.

parameters.name: number_of_songs
parameters.description: The number of songs to consider for determining the friend's favorite music tempos. If not specified, all rated songs of the friend will be considered.

200.description: Successful response with a list of the friend's favorite music tempos.

400.description: Invalid parameters or user does not share data.

get.summary: Retrieve the count of songs added by a specific friend over the last five days, considering their data sharing consent.

parameters.name: friend_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the friend whose recent song addition count is to be retrieved.

200.description: Successful response with a count of songs added by the friend over the most recent five days.

400.description: Invalid parameters or user does not share data.

post.summary: Send a friend of yours a song that you would like recommend. Your friend will receive a notification based on the recommended song in his notification bar.

requestBody.description: Data needed to send a friend a song suggestion.

receiver_user.description: The username of the receiver of the song suggestion.

song_id.description: The ID of the song for the song suggestion.

200.description: Successful response with returning a message, indicating that it was sent.

400.description: Missing parameters, Invalid method or Sending a song to yourself.

404.description: User not found or Song not found.

get.summary: Retrieve playlists for a user
get.description: Fetches all playlists associated with a given user ID. The number of playlists retrieved can be specified.

parameters.name: number_of_playlists
parameters.description: The number of playlists to retrieve.

200.description: List of playlists retrieved successfully

get.summary: Retrieve a specific playlist for a user by its ID
get.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific playlist using its unique ID.

parameters.name: playlist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the playlist to be retrieved

200.description: Playlist retrieved successfully

post.description: Creates a new empty playlist for the user. Description and name are optional, if not provided a default name and description will be generated.

name.description: The name of the new playlist. If not provided, a default name will be generated.

description.description: A description for the new playlist. If not provided, defaults to an empty string.

post.summary: Add a song to a playlist
post.description: Adds a specific song to a specified playlist based on their unique identifiers.

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier of the playlist

song_id.description: The unique identifier of the song

200.description: Song added to playlist successfully

404.description: Playlist or Song does not exist

put.description: Updates the details of an existing playlist, identified by its unique ID. Allows editing the playlist name and description.

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier of the playlist

name.description: The new name of the playlist

description.description: The new description of the playlist

200.description: Playlist edited successfully

delete.summary: Remove a song from a playlist
delete.description: Removes a specific song from a specified playlist, identified by their unique IDs.

parameters.name: playlist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the playlist

parameters.name: song_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the song

200.description: Song removed from playlist successfully

404.description: Playlist or Song does not exist

delete.description: Deletes a specified playlist, identified by its unique ID.

parameters.name: playlist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the playlist to be deleted

200.description: Playlist deleted successfully

post.description: Create and save a playlist with the provided details and songs.

404.description: User not found or one or more songs not found

get.summary: Retrieve all friend groups globally

200.description: A list of all friend groups

requestBody.description: Data for creating a new friend group, Note: Only name field is required, description field is not required

201.description: Friend group created successfully, returns the newly created friend group's id with a message field indicating that the friend group created successfully

400.description: Bad Request - When the required field name for the friend group is not provided.

get.summary: Retrieve a friend group by its ID

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The ID of the friend group to retrieve

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Flag to determine if extended information is required. If provided with any value(even dummy value works), the response provided in 200 status code will be returned. If not provided, members field from the 200 response will disappear and remaining fields will be returned.

200.description: Details of the friend group

400.description: Bad Request - If the id for friend group is not provided.

put.summary: Add a friend to a friend group. Please note that only the admin of a friend group can add new people to it.

requestBody.description: Data needed to add a friend to the group

group_id.description: The ID of the friend group

friend_name.description: The username of the friend to add

200.description: Friend successfully added to the group

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters, or the admin tries to add itself to the friend group, or the user is already in the friend group.

401.description: Unauthorized - If the user is not admin, he/she is not authorized to add friends to this group

404.description: Not Found - Either friend group or friend does not exist

put.summary: Remove a friend from a friend group. Please note that only the admin of a friend group can add new people to it.

requestBody.description: Data needed to remove a friend from the group

group_id.description: The ID of the friend group

friend_name.description: The username of the friend to remove

200.description: Friend successfully removed from the group

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters, or the admin tries to remove itself to the friend group, or the user is not in the friend group.

401.description: Unauthorized - If the user is not admin, he/she is not authorized to remove friends from this group

404.description: Not Found - Either friend group or friend does not exist

put.summary: Edit the name and description of a friend group. Please note that only the admin of a friend group can edit it.
put.description: This endpoint allows a user to edit the details of a friend group. Only the creator of the friend group can edit its details.

group_id.description: The unique identifier of the group to be edited

name.description: The new name of the friend group

description.description: The new description of the friend group

200.description: OK - Friend group edited successfully

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid group ID

401.description: Unauthorized - If the user is not the creator, he/she is not authorized to edit this friend group

404.description: Not Found - Friend group or user with the given ID does not exist

delete.summary: Delete a friend group. Please note that only the admin of a friend group can delete it.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the group to be deleted

204.description: No Content - Friend group deleted successfully

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid group ID

401.description: Unauthorized - If the user is not admin, he/she is not authorized to delete this friend group

404.description: Not Found - Friend group or user with the given ID does not exist

get.summary: Get all friend groups of a user

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Flag to determine if extended information is required. If provided with any value(even dummy value works), the response with the member field provided in 200 status code will be returned. If not provided, members field will disappear and remaining fields will be returned Both are represented in the 200 response example, first JSON object in it is when extended flag is not provided, second one is when extended flag is provided.

200.description: List of all friend groups of the user

404.description: Not Found - User does not exist

get.summary: Get playlists of a friend group.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The ID of the friend group whose playlists are being retrieved

200.description: List of playlists retrieved successfully

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid group ID

404.description: Not Found - Friend group does not exist

post.summary: Create an empty playlist in a friend group. To create a playlist, the user that issues this request must be a member of the group for which the id is provided in the request body.

requestBody.description: Data needed to create a new empty playlist in a friend group. playlist_description is NOT required.

playlist_name.description: The name of the new playlist

playlist_description.description: A brief description of the new playlist

group_id.description: The ID of the friend group where the playlist will be created

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to create a playlist in this group (user is not a member of the group, so he/she cannot create a playlist in the group.)

404.description: Not Found - Either the user or friend group does not exist

delete.summary: Delete a playlist from a friend group.To delete a playlist, the user that issues this request must be a member of the group for which the id is provided in the request body.

parameters.name: playlist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the playlist to be deleted

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid playlist ID

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to delete this playlist (user is not a member of the group, so he/she cannot delete a playlist in the group.)

404.description: Not Found - Playlist, user, or friend group does not exist

get.summary: Get a list of the suggestions made to an user.

200.description: Successful response with a list of notifications.

get.summary: Get the number of the suggestions made to an user that is unread by the user.

200.description: Successful response with a list of notifications.

put.summary: Mark a list of the suggestions made to an user as seen by the user.

200.description: Successful response with a message.

delete.summary: Delete a suggestion that was made to a user.

parameters.name: suggestion_id
parameters.description: The ID of the suggestion notification

200.description: Successful response with a message.

status.description: Friend request status: Accepted (A), Rejected (R), Pending (P)

id.description: Primary key identifier for the Playlist

songs.description: A list of songs in the playlist.

user_id.description: User ID of the playlist owner

friend_group_id.description: Friend group ID associated with the playlist

id.description: The unique identifier of the song.

release_year.description: The release year of the song.

img_url.description: The URL of the song's image.

main_artist.description: The name of the main artist of the song.

Pet.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
